§ 31707. Limitations on statutory construction Sections 31704 and 31705 of this title do not limit the amount of money a State may charge for registration of a commercial motor vehicle or the amount of any fuel use tax a State may impose. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 1033.)
